home.arabicTitle: Our Compass to the Most Beautiful Destinations
home.englishTitle: Our compass to the most beautiful destinations

about.title: Mudahal Platform
about.description: The Mudahal platform to identify the most prominent archaeological and tourist sites in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It contributes to the discovery of archaeological sites recently discovered by citizens and not yet classified by experts and workers in archaeology and tourism; so that they can be researched by specialists to classify and register them faster as archaeological and tourist landmarks.
